page.title: 09Going Shopping.
page.content: do not like it when my mum's always saying when's your baby due and so on. And when I'm out shopping I hate walking about, then I'd say " mum can we go home to watch my favourite programme" she would say " I'm just going in that shop and that's all" when I stand outside waiting with two heavy bags in my hands. My favourite shop is Morleys. I go to Brixton for Morleys. Morleys is a toy shop. When I go in it's like toy land. I like it when I go to the pie mash shop to eat, my mum hates it when we go to the pie and mash shop and I love it. When I go in it's like a hotel. When I get home I go out in the passage and take my topwear off and go to sleep on the couch, I have a very long sleep for about two hours.
